 ▐▛███▜▌   Claude Code v2.1.12
▝▜█████▛▘  Haiku 4.5 · Claude Max
  ▘▘ ▝▝    ~/Developer/claudeless

❯ /help
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
 ─Claude Code v2.1.12─ general ─ commands ─ custom-commands ─(←/→ or tab to cycle)─────────────────────────────────────


  Claude understands your codebase, makes edits with your permission, and executes commands — right from your terminal.
  / for commands    ctrl + o for verbose output              cmd + v to paste images
  & for background  backslash (\) + return (⏎) for newline   ctrl + s to stash prompt

 For more help: https://code.claude.com/docs/en/overview
